title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Add butter, diced celery, and carrots to a large stock pot over medium-high heat. Saut√© for 3 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for another 30 seconds.
Add chicken stock and season the broth with salt, black pepper, rosemary, thyme, and crushed red pepper to taste.
Bring the broth to a boil.
Once boiling, add egg noodles and cook just until noodles are al dente. Be cautious not to overcook them.
Remove the soup pot from heat as soon as the noodles are just barely tender.
Add cooked, shredded chicken meat to the soup.
Taste the broth and add more seasonings, if needed.
